MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW8 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Whitley Avenue, Emmett Street and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:39am.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:21pm on 14th January 2021
